item.title: [WIP] HMS Hood, 1/720, Italery/Zvezda, 2017
item.description: Italery kit from 1978, which explains strange 1⁄720 scale. I’ve got Zvezda version just because it was a present. Interesting fact - Zvezda is not allowed to sell this kit outside of ex-USSR because it’s just cheaper in it’s version. Model quality The kit is surprisingly good given it’s age. It’s pretty detailed, and the part quality is really nice. The only thing that surprised me was total lack of decals.
